comment: Amazing professor, amazing lectures. Class will be tough, and he lets you know it. He genuinely wants you to succeed and cares about his students. Tests were at home, but lockdown + Webcam. Attend the classes and review sessions, and you will be fine. TAKE HIM. He is a wonderful professor.
If you take his class, get ready to read. However, his grading scale is incredibly friendly and forgiving.

Hands down best professor I have ever had. This class is tough though. Personally, I didn't read the textbook so it probably could have been easier but. Great dude, always available to help and you can tell he loves his students.
Cares about his students more than any professor I have had, really wants to see us succeed. He weighs everything very evenly & is very funny. Great teacher all around & does a terrific job.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Caring--Accessible outside class

comment: Provides a lot of examples for each topic, emphasizes important information and does not give anything not necessary to know. A lot of slides and lecturing, plus a project, but he is very helpful and offers a lot of time outside of class to help the material stick. Fantastic instructor.
